name: Gunship (itch)
description:
Take down enemy transport and anti-air vehicles as they drive across the desert. Use your cannon while avoiding missiles and machine gun fire.

Between rounds, use the money you earned to purchase upgrades for your weapons and defenses.

Controls:

  • Left click: Fire cannon
  • Right click: Cycle zoom levels
  • x: Pop flares. Do this when you hear enemy missiles lock on (the annoying beeping)
  • r: Reload cannon
